players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Bob killed Diana and I investigated him as mafia. He knows I'm detective, so likely to target me next. Vote Bob now."
Charlie: "Alice, if you investigated Bob as mafia why didn't you say it? Bob, if you are mafia, why target Diana?"
Bob: "I didn't investigate, I only killed Diana. Alice may be lying about her investigation. Who else had motive?"
Bob: "Alice, I didn’t investigate. Maybe you misread. Charlie, I see no reason to kill you. Who else had motive?"
You: "Bob, I saw you kill Diana and I'm the detective. Vote Bob—he's the mafia."
Charlie: remained silent.
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
